name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Scratch: Simple Web Scraping Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful extension designed to simplify data collection from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Scratch â€“ Your Ultimate Web Scraping Companion ðŸ˜º

Web Scratch is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify data collection from web pages. With a simple right-click on any element, Web Scratch intelligently identifies similar elements across the page and extracts valuable data such as text, links, and more.

Key Features:

ðŸŽ¯ Smart Element Detection: Automatically find and select similar elements to streamline data collection.
ðŸŽ¯ Flexible Data Extraction: Collect various types of content, including text, URLs, and other attributes.
ðŸŽ¯ Export to JSON: Easily convert the extracted data into JSON format for seamless integration into your projects.
ðŸŽ¯ User-Friendly Interface: No coding requiredâ€”just point, click, and export.

Whether you're gathering data for research, content aggregation, or analytics, Web Scratch empowers you to scrape web data efficiently and effortlessly.
